homeTitle: Let's make writing essays more fun for everyone.
homeDescription: This is an app like a writing class that helps you when you are not good at writing.You might even start to enjoy writing essays and book reports that you didn't like before!

tabs.imagemap: How to make an image map
tabs.zinbutsu: Words to describe a character's personality

home.InitialQuestionOne: Will reading lots of books make you better at writing and language?
home.InitialQuestionTwo: If you're trying hard but your writing still doesn‚Äôt go the way you want, this guide will show you how to use the ‚ÄúEssay Helper App‚Äù and what‚Äôs great about it.

items.altText: I'm not good at writing essays!
items.heading: Once upon a time, there was a person named K who was not good at writing essays.
items.text: Writing essays is so annoying, I don‚Äôt want to do it. I don‚Äôt even have any ideas‚Äîwhy do I have to do it?

items.heading:
So, Komawan-chan came to teach the points.
'First, let's draw a map.'
items.text:
Let's expand the content by connecting things that come to mind from a single theme on the map!
You will come up with what to write one after another.

items.altText: I'm starting to get ideas of what I want to write!
items.heading:
" I'm starting to get ideas of what I want to write!" says K.

K started drawing a map enthusiastically.
items.text: When you write one theme in the middle, it becomes easier to get an image than when you are thinking in your head, and every time you add one, related words spring up.
items.urlText: ‚ñ∂ To how to make a map
items.urlText2: ‚ñ∂ Let's try making an image map

items.heading:
Komawan-chan's point!

Let's decide what to write in each paragraph of the essay by assembling the paragraphs.
items.text: Even if you decide what to write, you don't know how to write it... We will help you with the app.

items.altText: I figured out how to write it
items.heading: 'I figured out how to write it!' says K.
items.text:
Even if you know what to write, you get stuck because you don't know how to write it.
So, it would be convenient to have something to teach you.

items.heading:
Komawan-chan's point!

Let's try writing a sentence using what we've just done!
items.text: To revise your own sentence, you have to write it first, so let's just try writing a sentence for now.

items.altText: I feel like I can write more smoothly and better than before!!
items.heading: 'I feel like I can write more smoothly and better than before!!' says K. Their hand movements are fast.
items.text: Essays and book reports have a limit on the number of pages and characters. At such times, if there is a site where you can write as if you were writing on manuscript paper, you can easily check it.
items.urlText: ‚ñ∂ About the manuscript paper creation sheet

items.heading:
Komawan-chan's point 4!
'Let's find simple words from 'Finding the perfect expression' and 'Feelings and impressions'!'
items.text: I can only think of simple words, and even though I know they are simple, I often don't know cool words.

items.altText: I've used this word so many times.
items.heading: 'I've used this word so many times,' K realized.

items.altText: This paraphrase is great!! I didn't know there was such a way of writing.
items.heading:
'This paraphrase is great!!
I didn't know there was such a way of writing.'
items.text:
By using 'Finding the perfect expression' and 'Paraphrasing feelings and impressions', the essay became easier to understand.
Your vocabulary will also increase!
items.urlText3: ‚ñ∂ Words to describe a character's personality

items.heading:
K, who has become accustomed to writing essays, has now grown to the point where they say,
'Leave the essay to me!'
Try using K's recommended tools too!

nav.line1: When you can't think of what to write
When you don't know how to write
When you want to rephrase words

about.title: How to make an 'Image Map'
about.helmet: How to make an Image Map | Essay Helper App
about.modalTitle: About how to make an image map
about.modalText: Even if you can't think of anything in your head, when you write it down on paper, you'll be surprised at how many images come to mind! When you can't think of what to write, start by writing just one feeling in the middle of the paper (it's okay to start with 'It was interesting' or 'It wasn't interesting').
about.mainText1: I can't think of anything to write at all!
about.mainText2: In that case, let's try making an image map.
about.mainText3: Try writing something like the above on paper.
about.button1: Try making it with the image map creation tool ‚ñ∂
about.exampleText:
There is also an image map made by K.
Please use it as a reference.
about.mainText4: Let's decide what to write in each paragraph of the essay by assembling the paragraphs.

contact.helmet: Paraphrasing feelings and impressions | Essay Helper App
contact.title: Paraphrasing feelings and impressions
contact.modalTitle: How to use paraphrasing of feelings and impressions
contact.modalText: With 'Paraphrasing feelings and impressions', you can find out what kind of paraphrases are available. Are there any words in the sentences you've written that you'd like to paraphrase?
contact.introText1: Learn other ways to say the words you use,
contact.introText2: and if you find one you like, try using it in your own writing.
contact.devMode: Development environment mode: Using mock data
contact.formLabel1: Choose the feeling or impression you want to know about!
contact.errorAccess: An error occurred while retrieving data.
contact.errorAIResponse: Failed to get a response from the AI. Please try again later.
contact.errorAIComm: An error occurred while communicating with the AI. Please check your network connection.

hyougen.helmet: Find the perfect expression | Essay Helper App
hyougen.title: Find the perfect expression
hyougen.modalTitle: How to use 'Find the perfect expression'
hyougen.modalText: With 'Find the perfect expression', you can learn various expressions. Are there any words in the sentences you've written that you'd like to express differently?
hyougen.introText1: Learn other expressions for the words you use,
hyougen.introText2: and if you find one you like, try using it in your own writing!
hyougen.error: An error occurred. Please enter again.

zinbutsu.title: Words to describe a character's personality
zinbutsu.modalTitle: How to use 'Words to describe a character's personality'
zinbutsu.modalText: With 'Words to describe a character's personality', you can learn various expressions. Are there any words in the sentences you've written that you'd like to express differently?
zinbutsu.introText1: Learn other expressions for the words you use,
zinbutsu.introText2: and if you find one you like, try using it in your own writing!
zinbutsu.error: An error occurred. Please enter again.

danraku.intro1: Once you've decided what you want to write using an image map, etc.
danraku.intro2: Let's get some advice on what order to write things in.
danraku.modalText: Once you've decided what you want to write using an image map, etc., let's get some advice on what order to write things in.
danraku.modalMidashi: Once you've decided what you want to write, let's find the perfect way to write it for you.
danraku.copyInfo: Be sure to copy anything you like somewhere!
danraku.submitButton: Teach me how to assemble paragraphs!
danraku.wantsLabel: Write four things you want to write about in line with that theme

danraku.wants3Placeholder: Third thing you want to write
danraku.wants4Placeholder: Fourth thing you want to write

danraku.bookType10: A book about the earth and the environment
danraku.bookType13: A book with a character similar to you
danraku.bookType16: A book depicting the daily life of an imaginary character
danraku.bookType17: A story about going to a mysterious world

danraku.hyoushiLabel: Write about what you thought from the book cover or title before reading
danraku.hyoushiPlaceholder: What you thought from the cover/title
danraku.otherLabel: Write anything else you want to write about
danraku.tableHeader2: It's recommended to expand on this content and write a paragraph!
danraku.prevNextMidashi: Haven't decided what to write yet?
danraku.prevNextHonbun:
If you don't know what to write, a map is recommended!
Let's give it a try!
danraku.saiSenseiMidashi: I'll think of an essay that conveys things in an orderly manner.
danraku.risuSenseiMidashi: I'll think of an essay that values the summary of what you want to say.
danraku.raionSenseiMidashi: I'll think of an essay that brings out your personality.

genkouyoshi.ogDescription: Introducing useful tools for writing essays.
genkouyoshi.title: Recommended Tools
genkouyoshi.modalTitle: I want a tool that I can write with digitally and check the number of characters and pages!
genkouyoshi.modalText: Since essays have restrictions on the number of pages and characters, we introduce sites where you can find out how many characters your writing is over or under.
genkouyoshi.intro: Introducing useful tools for writing essays.
genkouyoshi.tool1Title: 1. Vertical Writing Manuscript Paper Creation Sheet
genkouyoshi.tool1Text: The 'Vertical Writing Manuscript Paper Creation Sheet' provided by the 'School Education Information Processing Study Group' is perfect for drafting before clean copying. It displays the number of characters and lines in your essay, so you can adjust your homework with a fixed number of characters.
genkouyoshi.tool1Link: Vertical Writing Manuscript Paper Creation Sheet
genkouyoshi.tool2Text:
'Figjam', provided by 'Figma, Inc. (Headquarters: San Francisco, USA)', is perfect for writing image maps.
It's easy to see and convenient!

imagemapPage.helmet: Image Map Creation Tool | Essay Helper App
imagemapPage.title: Image Map Creation Tool
imagemapPage.howToButton: How to use the Image Map Creation Tool
imagemapPage.inputLabel: ‚ñº You can write on the map by typing here! ‚ñº

steps.theme: Screen that appears when you open it
steps.text: When you open it, there's a square that says 'Idea' in the middle!
When you click the square in the middle, the text of the square (idea) will be displayed in the input field above.
Let's type what you want to write (first the theme) in the input field.

steps.theme: Let's delete unnecessary parts of the image map
steps.text:
Click on the unnecessary square part. Then click the 'Back Space (Windows)' button.
*For Mac, please click 'DELETE'.

This chat function is for asking questions when you can't think of anything and expanding the map! First, select your grade and choose whether you want to write an essay or a book report! Next, answer the questions that appear after that. That's all the questions! Next, let's actually use the chat function. Choose one of the three that suits you and send it!
